CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This difference of the dihedral angle between PTATDPP and PTAFDPP accounts for the difference of d 010 , and thus , PTATDPP is expected to form a more closely - packed lamellar structure than PTAFDPP.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PTATDPP (Phosphatidylcholine, N-acetylated, N-myristoylated, diacetyldimonium)
2. PTAFDPP (Phosphatidylcholine, N-acetylated, N-myristoylated, diacetyldimonium, formate)

These are the names of the two phospholipid molecules being compared in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. PTATDPP (Material Name)
2. PTAFDPP (Material Name)

I have removed the irrelevant entities "Phosphatidylcholine", "N-acetylated", "N-myristoylated", and "diacetyldimonium" as they do not refer directly to the Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PTAFDPP |

I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
